headline: Boeing’s Vietnam Orders Confront Mounting Safety And Legal Pressures
summary: Boeing (NYSE:BA) reports new multi billion dollar aircraft orders from Vietnamese airlines Sun PhuQuoc Airways and Vietnam Airlines. The company faces an FAA airworthiness directive affecting the 737 MAX fleet, focused on regulatory compliance and safety requirements. NASA classifies Boeing's 2024 Starliner test failure as a high severity mishap, putting added attention on its space operations. The US Supreme Court allows a lawsuit over Boeing's pilot training practices to proceed, extending...

headline: Is Boeing (BA) Pricing Reflect Its Potential After Recent Safety And Regulatory Headlines
summary: If you are wondering whether Boeing's current share price reflects its true value, this article will walk through what the numbers are really saying about the stock. The shares last closed at US$230.36, with returns of a 3.6% decline over 7 days, a 7.3% decline over 30 days, a 1.1% gain year to date, and a 33.1% gain over the past year, which may have changed how some investors view both its potential and its risks. Recent headlines around Boeing have focused on operational and safety...

headline: Wife of Pilot Killed in Deadly UPS Aircraft Crash Sues Boeing, General Electric
summary: LOUISVILLE, Ky., February 26, 2026--The wife of one of the pilots killed in last November’s crash of UPS Flight 2976 near Louisville’s Muhammad Ali International Airport has filed suit against airplane maker Boeing and engine maker General Electric, among others.
